Summary: Helicopter like object in the sky in my neighborhood, except glowing
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out taking pictures of the night sky when I notice what i presumed to be a helicopter flying in the area. So I took a picture of it. After loading it into the computer and enlarging it I noticed that it was not like any helicopter I've ever seen and after enlarging it, It did not look like a helicopter at all. Are we wittnessing the real life beginnings of an alien tranformers type deception. I know that this was not a helicopter, but what I'm asking is what is it exactly? This is no joke. I believe that they are now imitating conventional craft to fly through our air space. I could be wrong, but prove me wrong!
